attachments.title: Star Trek Risk Will Finally Determine Who's the Best Starfleet Captain of All Time
attachments.text: The Kirk vs. Picard debate will wage on in internet forums for centuries to come, but you can settle it at home by gathering your friends around a table and going head-to-head with Star Trek Risk. It pits your favorite Starfleet captains against each other including Kirk, Picard, Sisko, and Janeway. Jonathan Archer is also in the game.
attachments.fallback: io9: Star Trek Risk Will Finally Determine Who's the Best Starfleet Captain of All Time
